oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Knoxville Iron Company
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Knoxville Iron Company Foundry Machine Shops (at left?. At Second Creek, Knoxville, TN. Dr. Levi's home on Broad Street (upper right?) and Railroad Roundhouse (in background). 'Old rolling mills wheel flew through roof.' Ca. 1890s. From the Mary U. Rothrock Papers, fld. 2257c.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Foundries; Iron industry; Railroad roundhouses; Houses; Views;
